thread.title: Vikram Tamannah film directed by Vijay Chander to go on floors on February 10 2017 - Tamil Movie News
thread.title_full: Vikram Tamannah film directed by Vijay Chander to go on floors on February 10 2017 - Tamil Movie News

title: Vikram Tamannah film directed by Vijay Chander to go on floors on February 10 2017 - Tamil Movie News
text: Jayam Ravi's 'Vanamagan' - Teaser release date and time A couple of days back Indiaglitz reported that the shooting of 'Dhruva Natchathiram' directed by Gautham Menon will start in Chennai from today. (Read Here: Vikram's 'Dhruva Natchiram' shoot in Chennai ) . Now we learn that Vikram will take part in this Chennai schedule only for 2-3 days as he is expected to start shooting for another film from this Friday in Chennai. Sources reveal that Vikram's film with Vijay Chander of 'Vaalu' fame which was announced in December 2016 will start rolling from February 10, 2017. It has been confirmed that Tamannah will play the female lead in this film as speculated a few weeks ago. This will be the first time Vikram and Tamannah have teamed up for a film. Thaman will render the music score for the film while Sukumar is the cinematographer of this yet to be titled flick produced by Silverline Film Factory banner. It is said that Vikram will shoot for both the films til the end of June 2017.
